name: Audrey Tautou
summary: Audrey Tautou. Actress: Amélie. Audrey Justine Tautou was born on August 9, 1976 in Beaumont, France, to Evelyne Marie Laure (Nuret), a teacher, and Bernard Tautou, a dental surgeon. Audrey showed an interest for comedy at an early age and started her acting lessons at 'Cours Florent'. In 1998 she won the best young actress award in the ninth 'Jeune Comedien de Cinema Festival' in Bezier. Then, she came to...
awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Awards | 11 wins & 21 nominations total
